explains: adj. 机敏的；狡猾的；猜疑的；送秋波的

sentences.en: The government is leery of changing the current law.
sentences.cn: 政府对是否修改现行法律存有疑虑。

sentences.en: Executives say they are leery of the proposed system.
sentences.cn: 行政人员们说他们对拟建的系统持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: They were leery about investing in a company controlled by a single individual.
sentences.cn: 他们不太放心把资金投向一间由一人独自操控的公司。
